title: Instalocking
body: Hi, so today i was playing a game and i wanted to go adc. Problem was that there was a premade team who also wanted to go bot so they instalocked. By now, it was up to the skin selection so i was still an adc champ. In the end, two people went mid and fed all while flaming me at the time. I was wondering if Riot could do something about these instalockers or if anyone had any similar stories that they had to share? I only did this coz i found this extremely frustrating and upsetting.

replies.body: Unfortunately there is not a lot you can do about it. What I would suggest is playing team builder as you already have your role selected. It will take you longer to get into a game but at least you are guaranteed to play what you want and not feel like you have wasted 40 mins of your life
lol as much as it would be great for Riot to fix this, this kinda shit will always exist in online gaming. Just be the dick who locks in

instalocking asserts dominance, if someone asks politely for a role, assure them they will get it, THEN BAM, lock in the role they wanted, make direct conversation stating you are going in their role, win lane, become a man
